方法详细信息

now

public static long now()
Current system time.

返回：
current time in msec.

stringAsURI

public static java.net.URI stringAsURI(java.lang.String s)
                                throws java.io.IOException
Interprets the passed string as a URI. In case of error it assumes the specified string is a file.

参数：
s - the string to interpret
返回：
the resulting URI
抛出：
java.io.IOException

fileAsURI

public static java.net.URI fileAsURI(java.io.File f)
                              throws java.io.IOException
Converts the passed File to a URI.

参数：
f - the file to convert
返回：
the resulting URI
抛出：
java.io.IOException

stringCollectionAsURIs

public static java.util.Collection<java.net.URI> stringCollectionAsURIs(java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> names)
Converts a collection of strings into a collection of URIs.

参数：
names - collection of strings to convert to URIs
返回：
collection of URIs
